description: The MTA is North America's largest public transit agency, covering New York City and surrounding regions (Long Island, Hudson Valley, Connecticut). Manages NYC subways, buses, commuter rail (LIRR, Metro-North), bridges and tunnels. In 2023, it handled ~1.15 billion annual rides, ~3.6 million daily weekday ridership.

achievements: Developed and maintained high-impact apps, including train arrival displays, transit dashboards, and public info systems across web and mobile platforms.
Engineered full-stack solutions using React, Node.js, .NET, SQL Server, and AWS, contributing to performance-critical systems like the MTA Performance Dashboard and Metro North Trip Planner.
Built internal tools and automation workflows, including Visual Basic and Python scripts for metro card generation and S3-based data processing, improving operational efficiency across teams.
